remarks: Show that ` [_ R / s ]_ N ` is under ` P .\/ Q ` when ` R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2013.)

cdleme32a1.z $e |- Z = ( iota_ y e. B A. t e. A ( ( -. t .<_ W /\ -. t .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) -> y = Y ) ) $.
cdleme41sn3a $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ ( R e. A /\ -. R .<_ W ) ) /\ R .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) -> [_ R / s ]_ N .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) $.
